https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/65DkgHPSLVjgr6IYkpY9Aqqqid5.jpg A present-day idyllic kingdom where the benevolent teenage son of King Adam and Queen Belle offers a chance of redemption for the troublemaking offspring of Disney's classic villains: Cruella De Vil (Carlos), Maleficent (Mal), the Evil Queen (Evie) and Jafar (Jay). Descendants
